mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user( post_seq, post_title, post_content, post_img, post_eng, post_dtls, post_hashtag, post_star, post_user, post_date ) values ( seq_post.NEXTVAL, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{post_img}, #{post_eng}, #{post_dtls}, #{post_hashtag}, #{post_star}, #{post_user}, #{post_date} )
mapper.update: update tbl_user set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, role = #{role} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: create table tbl_user ( username VARCHAR2(50) PRIMARY KEY , password VARCHAR2(125) not null, email nVARCHAR2(125) not null unique, nickname nVARCHAR2(50) , name nVARCHAR2(50) , role VARCHAR2(20) )
